item.title: Firebase Emulator Advanced Usage Guide
item.description: The Firebase emulator suite allows developers to run a mock Firebase environment locally. Last week, Firebase released a new feature called the Emulator UI to visualize and manage Firestore (and Realtime DB) from the browser. The following lesson contains a variety of advanced techniques for setting up a Firebase development environment. ðŸŒ Did you know?
